description: A Flutter widget named TrendLine that displays a visual representation of spending trend data using a list of double points. The widget shows a title, handles empty data gracefully, and displays each point as a label within a Wrap widget.

classes.name: TrendLine
classes.description: StatelessWidget that renders a list of points as a trend visualization with a title and data labels.

methods.name: TrendLine
methods.description: Constructor for the TrendLine widget, requiring a list of double points.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying a title and the list of points or a 'No data' message if points are empty.
